to complain: He was kvetching about the price.

to say something is not right or satisfactorycomplainI hate to complain, but the film was terrible.grumbleShe's always grumbling about something.whineI hope you don't think I'm just whining.kvetchStop kvetching about it!make a fussIf the food doesn't come soon, I'm going to make a fuss.file a complaintI've filed a complaint with the police about the noise.
